user_added_to_user_group.title: You were added to a new user group!
user_added_to_user_group.content: You are now part of the user group '{name}'! You may now have access to new resources!

user_removed_from_user_group.title: You were removed from a user group!
user_removed_from_user_group.content: You are no longer part of the user group '{name}'! You may have lost access to some resources!
